file_content.text: Understood. Thank you.
Thank you....
Damn....
What was that about?
Master Surro. She went catatonic for a while--now she's responsive. Not in the greatest shape, but they say it's promising.
Some good news would be nice for a change.
Fingers crossed.
Yeah, I'm right there with you.
She knew the risks going in, Theron. You have to remember that.
Don't guilt yourself to death.
I asked Master Satele and others to reach out with the Force, try to see if Master Surro's all right. Nothing.
Been trying to find out if any of the Sixth Line made it out of Ziost. Doesn't look good.
They just lost Master Onok. He was the last of the Sixth Line. They're all dead now.
For what it's worth, you have my condolences.
Sorry to hear that.
I can't blame you for Onok and the others--but Master Surro, she surrendered.
You let Master Onok live, but Master Surro....
She was the Emperor's "favorite", I get that, but I want to believe we could have done something--anything.
Any insight she can provide into the Emperor's methods will be huge for us.
She's serving a purpose now.
You saw her, Theron. She was too far gone.
It was an act of mercy.
The grip the Emperor had on her, would we ever really know who was in control?
We could never trust her.
Judging from the state of Ziost, it's a wonder Master Surro ever broke the Emperor's hold at all.
I've seen Ziost. It's bad....
I heard. I can hardly imagine.
They were aware of the risks.
Same as any soldier, they enlisted knowing they could die.
The Sixth Line were soldiers. Trust me, they knew the danger they faced.
It's one thing to know it's true in your head....
You should never have sent them in blind like that.
That's on you.
How about that? You sound exactly like my conscience.
Saresh finally saw reason before things got too bad, got a bunch of our troops out of there--still, we lost so many, never mind the rest of Ziost....
Add to all that I found out Agent Kovach was actually working for Saresh all this time.
How do you know this?
What makes you say that?
Come on--you knew it, too. I get it now, why you did what you did.
Did he tell you that himself?
Caught him reporting in over holo. You'd think he'd know how to lock a door.
I know.
That's why he's dead.
That's what I thought. Makes a lot of sense now.
Yeah, didn't track for me that he was working for the Emperor. Makes way more sense now.
I know. I overheard him talking to Saresh, back on Ziost.
That isn't news to me.
You did? And you....
Makes sense, I guess. Wasn't exactly the best time to sort all that out.
Unbelievable.
[Lie] Really?
Yeah. Yeah, tell me about it.
What's his status now?
Far as I know, he's still pretending to work under Lana and reporting to Saresh.
Anyway, it's all out of my hands now. Suppose I shouldn't even be here, technically.
Saresh and Master Satele weren't all that excited to find out I had a team of black-ops Jedi on call without their knowledge. I'm on administrative leave--indefinitely.
They'll get past it, and you'll be back to work in no time. You'll see.
You'll be okay.
Hope you're right about that.
Forget about the SIS. I could use someone like you at my side.
Come away with me.
Uh-huh. I'm sure.
Tempting offer, but....
Growing up, I had an idea of who and what I would be. In a lot of ways, that didn't happen, but in the ways that matter....
What I'm saying is, I belong with the SIS. I'm not throwing in the towel.
Good to hear. We still have the Emperor out there somewhere, and Saresh will want to press the attack after Ziost.
Great--we have our hands full.
That does sound like Saresh all right.
[Flirt] Feel like a drink?
Why don't we pay a visit to the station cantina--for old times' sake?
I'll have to take a rain check, but....
Might be persuaded another time.
Since you're off duty now, why don't we drop by the cantina over on Carrick?
Sounds like fun, but I'll have to pass. Maybe next time.
It never hurts to know your limits, Theron.
Don't get too confident.
Don't I know it.
I should have reached out to you sooner. Whatever's next, whatever insanity comes our way... I won't make that mistake again.
May the Force be with you.
Take care of yourself.
They're right to be unhappy. If it was my decision, you'd be out--no question.
They should fire you.
Hey, I should have reached out to you sooner--that's on me. I know I've made mistakes, but....
All we've been through? I shouldn't even have to say it!
The Sixth Line, Agent Kovach, a leadership that doesn't trust you.... You're done, Theron.
Resign.
Respectfully--I can't undo my mistakes, but I'm good at what I do and I'm going to keep doing it.
I think we're done here. See you around.
Just because we had something doesn't mean I'm going to overlook your shortcomings.
This isn't about us--it's you.
You're a real piece of work. To think I ever--
I'm just calling it like I see it. There's no need to get emotional.
Nothing personal. Calm down.
You sanctimonious--! I've had enough of this.
There's nothing you can say. You misjudged Ziost. Misjudged Agent Kovach, Lana on Rishi, all the way back to Colonel Darok. You failed.
I see a failure.
And you don't know a damn thing.
See you around.
